questions.quote: Sixteen hundred dollars? That's all? *Ooh*, they are ripping me off.
Boy I had a helluva time finding that air-conditioner. I looked everywhere. I completely forgot where I hid it. You know where it was?
Oh, no, Sir. Festivus is all too real. And.. I could prove it - if I had to.
No, Leo's not there. He's got a girlfriend, Lydia. In fact, he moved in with her.
Look, Elaine, I've been thinking about this. This has got to be a massive conspiracy. Who knows how deep it goes. Hey, look, wait a second,  Kramer, turn that up.
You never support me! Let's see what George says about this.. Where're my pants?
Are you kidding? That's very significant! If he was interested in me, he'd want my germs! He'd just crave my germs!
Hey! I got bit by a dog! I had to go to the hospital! I was bleeding to death! I can't solve every little problem you have!
Well, we looked at your EKG's, ran some tests, did a complete work-up.
Well, OK. As I said the guy had it in for me. He actually failed me in gym. ... ME!
